actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to limit the number of terms Senators and Representatives may serve.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Limits the time an individual may serve in the Senate to three complete terms of six years each. Limits the time an individual may serve in the House to nine complete terms of two years each.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to limit the number of terms Senators and Representatives may serve.
